name: Reverse Plank
how_to_perform:
* Start by lying on your stomach with your hands shoulder-width apart and your fingers spread wide.*
* Engage your core muscles by drawing your navel towards your spine and keeping a slight arch in your lower back.*
* Slowly lift your arms, shoulders, and upper back off the ground, keeping your forearms parallel to each other.*
* Keep your shoulders down and away from your ears, and maintain a straight line from head to heels.*
* Hold this pose for 30-60 seconds, breathing normally.
short_summary: A modified plank that targets the latissimus dorsi muscles by lowering the upper body towards the ground.
